nodes.text: Pinyumb was a city on the volcanic planet of Sullust in the Outer Rim Territories of the galaxy. It was located in a massive cavern under the south side of the volcanic mountain Inyusu Tor. During the Galactic Civil War, Pinyumb was under the control of the Galactic Empire. When Sullust was targeted by the 61st Mobile Infantry of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, a battle between the Alliance and the Empire was fought on the mountain above the city.
Pinyumb appeared in the novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, which was written by Alexander Freed and published in 2015.
